/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC  -std=c++1y -g   -shared -Wl,-soname,liblibardrone.so -o liblibardrone.so CMakeFiles/libardrone.dir/libardrone.cpp.o -lpthread /opt/boost_1_57_0/lib/libboost_thread.so /opt/boost_1_57_0/lib/libboost_system.so /opt/cvdrone/lib/libcvdrone.a -lavdevice -lavutil -lavfilter -lswscale -lavformat -lavcodec -Wl,-rpath,/opt/boost_1_57_0/lib
